casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Gary Maurice WALTERS. No. 344PA14. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Paul F. Herzog, Fayetteville, Attorney at Law, for Walters, Gary Maurice. Mary Carla Babb, for State of North Carolina. Mr. L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 29th of September 2014 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
